Q_DESC:
Write a program to find maximum occurring character in a string.
All characters in the string must be lowercase.
Use dictionary to store letter: count details.
TESTCASE_1:
peacock
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
The maximum occuring letter in peacock is c appears 2 times
TESTCASE_2:
engineering
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
The maximum occuring letter in engineering is e appears 3 times
TESTCASE_3:
ubuntu
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
The maximum occuring letter in ubuntu is u appears 3 times
